name: Quenya Meets Music Quiz | J. R. R. Tolkien | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
ilye.

	"Ilye" is Elven for "all".  The Beatles sing the song "Yellow Submarine" which says "We all live in a yellow submarine.

vana.

	"Vana" is Elven for "beautiful. In the musical "Oklahoma!" Curly sings the opening song "Oh what a beautiful morning"

varda.

	"Varda" is Elven for "exhalted" The lyrics come from a Christian song.

namárië.

	"Namárië" is Elven for "farewell".  In the "Sound of Music" one of the songs song by the children is "So long, Farewell."

questions.text: "I fell into the burning ring of _______."
questions.explanation:
nar.

	"Nar" is Elven for "fire". Johnny Cash sings the song "Ring of Fire."

Khile.

	This one was tough...all the words are forms of "to follow" in Elvish.  "Khile" means "Follow" (a command), "Khil" means "to follow" (infinitive), "Khiluva" means "will follow" (future), and "Khilai" means "may it follow" (subjunctive).  The song of course is from "The Wizard of Oz."

questions.text: "Riding through the desert on a ________ with no name."
questions.explanation:
rokko.

	"Rokko" is Elven for "horse".  "America" sings this song called "A Horse With No Name."

questions.text: Blue _______, I saw you standing alone."
questions.explanation:
isil.

	"Isil" is Elven for "moon".  "Blue Moon" has been song by many people, my favorite version is the one by Ella Fitzgerald.  Some extra trivia: A blue moon is when there are two full moons in one month.

questions.text: "It's ______ or never, kiss me my darling, be mine tonight."
questions.explanation:
si.

	"Si" is Elven for "now". "It's Now or Never" is an Elvis Presley song.

questions.text: "In the _____________ of the "Ho Ho Ho" Green Giant."
questions.explanation:
tumbo.

	"Tumbo" is the Elven word for "valley." This is the jingle for "Green Giant" vegetables.
